modelHomes.description: This 2-bedroom, 2-bath home features granite countertops in the kitchen and ensuite, a tile shower, and main floor laundry. With a fully finished basement, covered concrete patio, and all-brick, stone, and stucco exterior, it's the perfect blend of style and functionality.

This freshly completed two-story townhouse boasts spacious rooms and no condo fees, offering the ultimate freedom. Step into the sunlit kitchen and explore three bedrooms upstairs, including a luxurious ensuite. With fully sodded lawns and a double-car paved driveway, seize the opportunity for upscale living in this vibrant neighborhood - schedule your private viewing today!

Discover the perfect blend of comfort and style in this charming 2-bedroom bungalow. With an open concept layout, cloud white kitchen, gas fireplaces, and a fully finished basement, this meticulously crafted home offers a delightful living experience.

Experience comfort and luxury in this meticulously crafted 2-bedroom home with 1320 square feet, featuring 9' ceilings, a cloud white kitchen with granite counters, gas fireplaces, a master suite with walk-in closet and ensuite, a fully finished lower level, and an elegant stone, brick, board and batton exterior with a covered deck. Don't miss the opportunity to make this your dream home.
